spike_volley.name: Spike Volley
spike_volley.description: Fires a volley of spikes, damaging multiple enemies

boulder_throw.name: Boulder Throw
boulder_throw.description: Throws a boulder, dealing high crush damage

gore_charge.name: Gore Charge
gore_charge.description: Charges with horns, knocking back enemies

stone_gaze.name: Stone Gaze
stone_gaze.description: Turns an enemy unit to stone temporarily

lure.name: Lure
lure.description: Attracts animals to a location for easy hunting

sentinels.name: Sentinels
sentinels.description: Creates defensive statues at a Town Center

bolt.name: Bolt
bolt.description: Instantly kills a single enemy unit

ceasefire.name: Ceasefire
ceasefire.description: Pauses combat for a short time

oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.description: Reveals a portion of the map

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: Damages enemy buildings in an area

pestilence.name: Pestilence
pestilence.description: Prevents enemy buildings from producing units temporarily

restoration.name: Restoration
restoration.description: Heals friendly units in an area
